FindingName: Security Contacts Not Set on Subscription
Description: The identified subscriptions do not have Security Contacts set. Security contacts receive security alert notifications for events happening on the subscription.
Remediation:
Go to Subscriptions > select the identified subscription > select "Security" > select "Environment settings" > select the subscription > select "Email notifications" and configure the desired recipient(s). Additionally, the following PowerShell commands can configure this setting:
Set-AzSecurityContact -Name "MyPolicy" -Email "john@mytenant.com" -Phone "555-555-5555" -AlertAdmin -NotifyOnAlert

References.Text: Configure email notifications for security alerts
